data.name: Transformers™: Fall of Cybertron™ - DINOBOT Destructor Pack
data.detailed_description: Download this pack to get 4 new characters (SWOOP, GRIMLOCK, SLUG and SNARL) and their associated parts for use in Multiplayer.
data.about_the_game: Download this pack to get 4 new characters (SWOOP, GRIMLOCK, SLUG and SNARL) and their associated parts for use in Multiplayer.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows® XP/Vista/7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.6 GHz or AMD Phenom X3 8750
  • Memory: 2 GB system RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.4 GB Free Space
  • Video Card: GeForce 8800 GT series with 512 MB RAM or ATI Radeon HD 4850 with 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c or DirectX 10
  • Sound: DirectX compatible Sound card
  • Additional: Broadband connection and service required for Multiplayer Connectivity. Internet connection required for activation.
